title: 使用某些命令内部错误
txt_content:
/difficulty <new difficulty> [m
2013-09-28 08:08:18 [INFO] CONSOLE: Set difficulty to EASY[m
2013-09-28 08:08:21 [WARNING] Unexpected exception while parsing console command "difficulty 2"
org.bukkit.command.CommandException: Unhandled exception executing 'difficulty 2' in org.bukkit.command.defaults.DifficultyCommand(difficulty)
        at org.bukkit.command.SimpleCommandMap.dispatch(SimpleCommandMap.java:193)
